p: Cyclosporine is a drug with narrow therapeutic index: underdosing may lead to severe GVHD, and overdosing to toxic events or poor graft-versus-leukemia (GVL) effect [ 5â€“ 7]. Thus, therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM) is required and dosage regimens are adapted to reach a target cyclosporine minimal blood concentration value, chosen according to patient's characteristics and disease [ 6, 8].
